home.lead: Resource Point has the IT experts you need.
home.skilledIntro: We are a reputed consultant company in Gothenburg with experience of more than 25 years.
home.skilledDescription: Our core strengths are in supplying skilled and experienced consultants at competitive prices. We provide everything from coders fresh out of school to experienced system architects for short or long-term contracts. If you need competence that is hard or impossible to find in Sweden, we can provide that through our partners.
home.stepsIntro: We guide you through every step to find the best talent.
home.ideaTitle: If you have the idea, we will find the right way
home.ideaText: We're here to inform which tactics need funding and which are drain resources. Real-time will have multiple touchpoints.
home.positionsTitle: Be at the forefront of the new innovation
home.positionsText: Your goals are individual. We believe business advice should be too, so we help your business thrive in this work environment.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Headquartered in Göteborg, the western gateway to Sweden, Resource Point AB is a 25+ year old firm, providing software solutions, services and resources to firms in Scandinavia.
about.sectionTwoDescription: Resource Point is a distinguished consulting company with its roots firmly planted in the vibrant city of Gothenburg, Sweden. Established in 1997, Resource Point has been a trusted partner for organizations seeking innovative solutions and expert guidance in a rapidly evolving business landscape. With over two decades of experience, the company has built a reputation for excellence in providing strategic insights, tailored recommendations, and practical implementation support across various industries.
about.sectionTwoDescription2: Resource Point AB is your trusted consulting partner, dedicated to helping you unlock your full potential and achieve sustainable growth. With a wealth of experience and a team of experts in various domains, we specialize in providing tailored solutions and strategic guidance to organizations across industries.
about.internshipDescription: We have a running collaboration with IT-Högskolan i Väst, where we take in a group of students and give them real assignments to build IT applications for their internship. That gives them real experience from worklife and we support them with expertise from our senior consultants at the same time as we are getting to know them personally. We also help them with what it takes to get assignments as consultants or their first job, when they graduate.

timeline.title: Expertise:
timeline.event: The company was founded under the name IT-System Väst AB (ITSV).
timeline.event1: ITSV merged with Ra Intervention AB and changed its name to Resource Point AB.
timeline.event2: We stay at the forefront of technology trends to provide you with cutting-edge solutions that give you a competitive advantage.
timeline.event3: Count on us for dependable, 24/7 support and proactive monitoring to keep your systems running smoothly.
timeline.event4: Today we are a consultancy company providing competent candidates for both the private and the public sector

about.info: The operational processes are what drives the business
